Feats-Skill-Nature -- Female Half-Elf Druid: 2
Strength: 10 (+0) Dexterity: 12 (+1) Constitution: 12 (+1) Intelligence: 14 (+2) Wisdom: 18 (+4) Charisma: 12 (+1)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 1500/2000 Level: 2 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 5/10
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 1; Class: 2; General: 0; Skill: 1 Selectable Feature Count: Druid (Order); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Bonded Animal; Call Of The Wild; Cooperative Nature; Natural Medicine; Order Explorer (Wild); Train Animal Druid Features: Ability Boost (Wisdom); Ability Boosts; Anathema; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense); Druid Feats; Druid Skills; Druidic Language; Druidic Order; Perception Trained; Primal Spellcasting; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Shield Block; Skill Feats; Spell Trained (Primal); Storm; Wild Empathy Acolyte Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Half-Elf; Human Heritage
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 1 selections
Druid Feats: 1 selections
Druidic Order: 1 selection
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Order Explorer (Wild): +1 Class Feat
Skill Feats: 1 selections
Storm: Has the Storm Born feature
Anathema: May not perform acts or cast spells prohibited by druidic order
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Order Explorer (Wild): Can select Wild order feats
Train Animal: Can use 7 days' training and a successful Nature check to teach an animal to perform a trick
Perception: +8 (wisdom; trained)
Skill Modifiers:
Abadar Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Goblin Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Acrobatics: +5 (dexterity; trained) Intimidation: +1 (charisma; untrained) Society: +2 (intelligence; untrained)
Arcana: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +4 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Athletics: +0 (strength; untrained) Nature: +10 (wisdom; expert) Survival: +4 (wisdom; untrained)
Crafting: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Occultism: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Taldan History Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Deception: +1 (charisma; untrained) Performance: +1 (charisma; untrained) Thievery: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Diplomacy: +1 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +8 (wisdom; trained)
Languages: Common; Druidic; Elven; Jotun; Undercommon
Skill Notes:
Druid Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Choose 4 from any)
Druidic Language: Knows a druid-specific language
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Storm: Skill Trained (Acrobatics)
Bonded Animal: Can use 1 week of interaction and a successful DC 20 Nature check to make an animal permanently helpful
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Natural Medicine: Can use Nature to Treat Wounds; gives a +2 bonus in wilderness
Storm Born: Suffers no Perception penalties from weather
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Wild Empathy: Can use Diplomacy with animals to Make An Impression and to make simple Requests
Combat
Hit Points: 26 Armor Class: 15 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +5 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +5 (dexterity; trained); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Magic
Spell Slots: P0: 5; P1: 3 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Primal: +8 (wisdom; trained) Spell DC: Primal: 18 (wisdom; trained)
Spells: Tempest Surge (P1 Evo): (2) R30' Inflicts 1d12 HP electricity, clumsy 2 for 1 rd, and 1 persistent electricity (save Reflex inflicts HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP)
Magic Notes:
Storm: Knows the Tempest Surge primal spell/Has a focus pool and 2 Focus Points
Call Of The Wild: Can spend 10 min to replace a prepared spell with Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus of the same level
Primal Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the primal tradition
Storm Born: Suffers no ranged spell penalties from weather
Notes
Validation Errors: General And Skill Feat Allocation: 1 available vs. 3 allocated
